messages.subject: Merchant's reminder...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - Seems like the three pair of menuki I m peddling on Ebay are not getting much interest so I thought a take a look email might help. Auction ends
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

Seems like the three pair of menuki I'm peddling on Ebay are not getting much interest so I thought a "take a look" email might help. Auction ends Sunday evening so have a look-see, okay? Thanks!

Ron
STL
